title: Z_MBFM
author: Z_MBFM
content: elon musk change the twitter logo and he also offer to a guy he walt to buy a twitter account @x for $69.42M . What is the reason for his madness? Why does he like X so much? Or because this is his first project was x.com, that's why he has emotions in it  https://twitter.com/ElonMuskAOC/status/1683747985791000576?t=NvhGuI8ugcFn2R1NlzvKhg&s=19

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Z_MBFM on July 28, 2023, 09:42:19 AMhttps://twitter.com/ElonMuskAOC/status/1683747985791000576?t=NvhGuI8ugcFn2R1NlzvKhg&s=19I don't think Elon Musk's Twitter account is https://twitter.com/ElonMuskAOC but rather https://twitter.com/ElonMusk so the account below that made the $69.42M bid is not Elon Musk's, even the account name is a little different.The ease of accounts getting the blue mark made fraud much easier, which is one of the disastrous decisions taken by Eon Musk.Changing the platform to X is a direction for Twitter to be bigger than a platform for personal blogs, but I wish I had launched the X service and integrated Twitter with it instead of changing the name of the service just as Facebook did with Instagram and threads.

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: Do you really think that this is serious?This is a joke. "Nigerian prince phone number"? "69 hours". 69.42 million.... 1.Buying and selling accounts is against Twitter's Terms of Service.2.Elon Musk is the owner of twitter, he could simply ban/suspend/delete this X account and take possession over this username/Twitter handle.Not the nicest thing to do, but who cares. I kinda get Elon's plan to build a "super app", that will have many functionalities, but buying Twitter and totally changing it's brand, logo and business model still seems like a mistake.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: I wish this was just sarcasm but OP seems pretty serious with his post which I find funny. Did he miss the "Parody" attached to the name and the description that it's a parody account or he saw it but just do not know what it means?

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: I can't say with all assurance that this could be the Official Elon Musk Handle as I believe that check tag or marks are easily to get than before so whomever that got verified could be able change their profile details without any restrictions in my opinion. And from my understanding the write up looks like a cheap Nigerian scammer as I believe Elon Musk himself can't just go pm someone in the way without any sign to show. That's to say he can't write in that way as he is not a mad and a naughty writer who does things for a joke. But however, I might be wrong with my thinking as anything is possible if he could buy off twitter what more X.Maybe he wanna buy X who knows if he planned  this to launch a crypto exchange.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Now this may look like it is a funny post. However, it is true that Elon Musk took the username name x from its previous owner (now the owner is using username (x1234567898765). It was all over the platform and people were asking if Elon bought the username yet the previous username owner never answered. The attached photo from op can be found on the reply on of the previous owner's recent tweets.

comments.author: Uruhara
comments.body: Based on what I read from some reports that Elon had taken the username @X from his original user without giving any monetary compensation but he thanked him and offered him a choice of X Merchandise and a tour of X headquarters. Handle @X's initial user was Gene X Hwang who was a one of the founders of event photo company Oange Photography, now the handle has changed to @x12345678998765.1 But in this case we as Twitter users do not have any rights in the ownership of the handle name we use. so that Twitter can take the handle that we use at any time.--------Reference: 1. https://www.msn.com/id-id/berita/other/cerita-pemilik-asli-akun-x-diambil-elon-musk-tiba-tiba-tanpa-imbalan-uang/ar-AA1esv0F?ocid=winp1taskbar&cvid=b98be1dddfb34416833aae68a1f0184e&ei=10

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Z_MBFM on July 28, 2023, 09:42:19 AMelon musk change the twitter logo and he also offer to a guy he walt to buy a twitter account @x for $69.42M . What is the reason for his madness? Why does he like X so much? Or because this is his first project was x.com, that's why he has emotions in it  Looks like you are still new on TwitterThere's what we call parody accounts and then memes  The word around was that the owner was just offered a selection X merchandise and a visit to X’s HQ to meet members of the teamRead this article before you just post false information https://www.nbcnews.com/tech/tech-news/elon-musks-takes-x-handle-longtime-twitter-user-rcna96074

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: Eternad on July 28, 2023, 01:26:04 PM[....]Why the heck Elon needs to ask the login info while he has the database for all the login credentials of Twitter account. Also how come they decided to that kind of odd price.  Don't forget that "Nigerian Prince" line there which is a known scam method.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Quote from: Uruhara on July 28, 2023, 01:30:05 PMBased on what I read from some reports that Elon had taken the username @X from his original user without giving any monetary compensation but he thanked him and offered him a choice of X Merchandise and a tour of X headquarters. Handle @X's initial user was Gene X Hwang who was a one of the founders of event photo company Oange Photography, now the handle has changed to @x12345678998765.1 But in this case we as Twitter users do not have any rights in the ownership of the handle name we use. so that Twitter can take the handle that we use at any time.--------Reference: 1. https://www.msn.com/id-id/berita/other/cerita-pemilik-asli-akun-x-diambil-elon-musk-tiba-tiba-tanpa-imbalan-uang/ar-AA1esv0F?ocid=winp1taskbar&cvid=b98be1dddfb34416833aae68a1f0184e&ei=10So I was right. I have been seeing tweets regarding this but I was not sure if it was true. However, you made a good point here about users not actually owning their usernames and can be taken away by the platform whenever they want. If it is true that Elon offered those things to the recent username owner then I think it was pretty generous of him and based on the previous owner's tweet it seems like he expected it to happen the moment X was announced.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: Elon already bought the twitter and one of the way he use is to gain income with the verified account and more, this x re-branding with the Twitter is part of the marketing strategy with the coin he will release which is becomes trend and get immediately dump by the investors, tons of joke right now in the internet so this could be a sarcastic or what even in my perspective I never trust elon anymore.

comments.author: icalical
comments.body: OP do you really think that's a real Elon Musk account, the display name clearly stated that it's a parody. And for the context, the username @X has already been taken over by Elon anyway, it's now used for the official X (the new twitter) account on the platform without the previous owner permission or any compensation.https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-12339581/Elon-Musk-accused-taking-X-Twitter-account-San-Fran-snapper-Gene-X-Hwang-says-just-took-platforms-rebrand.html

comments.author: Oluwa-btc
comments.body: Quote from: davis196 on July 28, 2023, 10:13:52 AMDo you really think that this is serious?This is a joke. "Nigerian prince phone number"? "69 hours". 69.42 million.... 1.Buying and selling accounts is against Twitter's Terms of Service.2.Elon Musk is the owner of twitter, he could simply ban/suspend/delete this X account and take possession over this username/Twitter handle.Not the nicest thing to do, but who cares. I kinda get Elon's plan to build a "super app", that will h hiave many functionalities, but buying Twitter and totally changing it's brand, logo and business model still seems like a mistake. Xtraordinary ain't it? Yeah, this is dead serious. Elon Musk did posted and same goes with Linda Yaccarino who's teaming up the X' squads on how they'll be teaming up to launch the futuriXtic X. Believe me, I bash Elon Musk a whole lot for so much experiments done with/ on Twitter.Rules are meant to be broken and the upgrade or update of this X shit would be for the betterment and growth of the Twitter App.69.42 Mill...ion! Holy Cow! That's woof. Godspeed to him, he better diversifies and not spend on hooker's. You really should care because this is the richest man on earth making improvements on the App used by big organizations and big handle's likewise government. It would definitely control the markets. LolWhatever Musk has done despite all the critics he gets has always been for solving and improving human beings even though he gets self centered. Change is something people don't take easily, let's be open to see what Elon Musk has for us. He's no villain, ten times better than FTX owner wanting to escape prison.

comments.author: Flexystar
comments.body: This is crazy, at first I also got into serious mode after seeing the entire post and screenshots. It is as funny as Elon not being serious about running the Twitter itself. It’s hard to see how scams are easy to perform these days. The user with X username must have felt the same way as we did at first glance of reading the post. Though users are very careful these days and it seems he does have many followers so must be some sort of publisher or otherwise public figure to get it. He would definitely check the authenticity already.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: He is a known troll and honestly I am not going to put money into anything he does going forward.  Dude is a little unhinged to be running such huge corporations.  At a certain point all of this is going to blow up in his face.  He just likes to see his name plastered everywhere.  In the beginning it was funny but it's starting to get cringy.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: this is not the real account of Elon Musk this account controlled by another person so any tweet from this account is not fully truth . but yes this news is correct that Elon Musk is changed the Twitter logo because he love the present  logo. but yes alone mask was build a project X.com many years ago but that time that was that was not a big successfully. so now when Elon Musk is become a popular person he want to promote his emotional projection logo X though  Twitter. I actually  don't know why he doing this. but I think he has a great purpose for doing this. because he is a clever person he will not done anything without any big purpose

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: He is not serious about that. There is nothing serious about what he posts on Twitter. Why would he buy an account when he can just take that account himself, Elon doesn't care about reputation, he has far more concerned about his money and his Space X. The doge pumped when he did this, he still has influence over this coin.What he is serious about is turning Twitter into X, he has plans to add an exchange and payment system to it.

comments.author: armanda90
comments.body: The X logo is a new look for Twitter for now after Elon Musk made changes in recent days, unpredictable with twitter social media platform at the future actually after acquisition and have been published with many new rule for Twitter user. Its not our business because Elon Musk have acquisition twitter with most expensive price but seems not comfortable as before when using Twitter for our social media platform. Its seems not permanent with twitter logo change become X because has change later Elon Musk will change with other logo, did you remember when first time after acquisition he change with Doge coin logo? unpredictable what is in mind from Elon Musk because several time he changed with twitter logo and hasn't permanent change.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: dothebeats on July 28, 2023, 01:18:31 PMNow this may look like it is a funny post. However, it is true that Elon Musk took the username name x from its previous owner (now the owner is using username (x1234567898765). It was all over the platform and people were asking if Elon bought the username yet the previous username owner never answered. The attached photo from op can be found on the reply on of the previous owner's recent tweets. Part where he took the account is true. Owner of @x account got zero dollars for it, which seems like an abusive move from elon. Imagine building your twitter account 16 years and then comes a billionaire and just takes it, and gives you nothing for it. But it doesn't surprise me at all, that's elon for you. How would you feel about the twitter after that? And yes i keep calling it a twitter and tweets tweets. Priivate Message you are referring to came from a parody account pretending to be elon. Why would he pay if he can just take stuff?

comments.author: panganib999
comments.body: Bro's fascination with X is just on a different level it almost feels like it's obsessive, when he's an executive at paypal he wanted to name it x.com but he was kicked out so he was stopped, now that he's the owner of twitter he's doing all that he can to impose this change which is just idiotic cause twitter is a billion dollar name brand that he's changing for an edgy bullshit reason lol. Also OP he never paid the guy who owns the @x tag on twitter and just forcefully took the tag from him without any notification, which in my culture is collectively known as a massive "dick move". The screenshot you gave us is a parody account on twitter that's trying to impersonate him cause he's a stupid clown that shot his own foot with the verification badge bs and now everyone can impersonate someone they wanted.
